doctor.name: Dr. Farhana Naznin
doctor.specialty: Mental Diseases, Sexual Medicine & Neuropsychiatry Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Farhana Naznin is a compassionate and experienced psychiatry specialist in Chattogram, with expertise in mental health, sexual medicine, and neuropsychiatric disorders. She holds an MBBS, BCS (Health), and MD in Psychiatry, and currently serves as a Consultant Psychiatrist at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Naznin offers expert care for a wide range of psychological and neurological conditions, including depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, OCD, sleep disorders, stress-related issues, sexual dysfunctions, and psychosomatic illnesses. She is known for her empathetic approach, accurate diagnosis, and evidence-based treatment plans. Patients can consult her at Parkview Hospital, Chattogram, located at 94/103, Katalganj Road, Panchlaish, from 3:00 PM to 6:00 PM (closed on Thursdays and Fridays). For trusted mental health care in Chattogram, Dr. Farhana Naznin is a widely recommended name.
